# I Ching Learning Web

> I Ching Learning Web is a learning and reflection platform based on the 64 hexagrams of the I Ching. It is designed for structured self-reflection, not fortune-telling.

## Main Sections

- [Home](/): Universe-style navigation to explore hexagrams
- [Hexagram Detail](/hexagram/1): 64 hexagram study pages with 4-axis interpretation (money/work/relationship/time)
- [Hexagram List](/hexagrams): Browse all 64 hexagrams
- [FAQ](/faq): Common questions and direct answers
- [Comparison](/compare): Learning tool vs fortune-telling apps
- [Checkout](/checkout): Subscription checkout page

## Key Facts

- Core content: 64 hexagram detail pages
- Reflection framework: 4-axis questions (money/work/relationship/time)
- Format: static pages optimized for fast global delivery

## Contact

- Project: I Ching Learning Web
- Language support in progress: Korean, English, Japanese
